content_profile.title: How to use AI to build your SaaS startup (Lovable, Supabase)

key_takeaways: Solution: Stop prompting your way to success and start with proper planning (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Become a better product manager and provide detailed, precise requirements (Difficulty: intermediate)
AI Workflow: Product Manager Approach to AI Tools
Growth Tactic: Use boring marketing.com for SEO optimization (Channel: seo)
Strategy: Apply product management methodology to AI tool usage
